about_the_game:
Sometime after the fall of Olympus, the gods have become scarce. In this power vacuum, men grow bold. An oppressive empire begins to form and spread across the land, burning, pillaging and murdering as they go. The callousness and cruelty of the new Empire is not without consequence, however. When imperial soldiers attack a small farmstead, a new enemy is created: a young man and his two sisters manage to escape this attack at great cost and vow revenge against those who wronged them.

Warlord is a text-heavy visual novel. You play as a male farm-boy with a dark secret: Preceding the attack on your farmstead, you were mortally wounded. To save your life, your sisters brought you to a witch who performed a bonding ritual between you and a succubus spirit. The spirit makes you capable of using abilities associated both chaos and lust. Choosing to use these abilities changes your outlook and enables and limits future choices in the game. Choose your affinities wisely for they will eventually lead you down a path of love or a darker path.

Hybrid-graphics Approach

Warlord focuses heavily on the intimate/dramatic moments of the game with high-quality animations. Scenic, stylized images and animated images are used in between where most of the story unfolds.

Features:

  • Male protagonist

  • Animations

  • Immersive story telling

Current Content:

  • 16 Chapters

  • 100+ animated images and CG

  • 15 animated sex-scenes with variations (depending on route)

Content "Flavors":

  • Oral Sex

  • Male-Female Sex

  • Incest

  • Group Sex

  • Hand-job

  • Corruption

  • Hypnosis (seduction)

  • Netorare (optional toggle, choice-dependant)

  • Netori (1.1 update, choice-dependant)

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains full nudity, sexual content including various sex acts, violence and gore. Sex acts include fellatio, male-female sex and female-female sex. Game also contains harem and incestuous relationships. Also contains "reluctant" sexual acts and attempted sexual assault.

detailed_description:
Sometime after the fall of Olympus, the gods have become scarce. In this power vacuum, men grow bold. An oppressive empire begins to form and spread across the land, burning, pillaging and murdering as they go. The callousness and cruelty of the new Empire is not without consequence, however. When imperial soldiers attack a small farmstead, a new enemy is created: a young man and his two sisters manage to escape this attack at great cost and vow revenge against those who wronged them.

Warlord is a text-heavy visual novel. You play as a male farm-boy with a dark secret: Preceding the attack on your farmstead, you were mortally wounded. To save your life, your sisters brought you to a witch who performed a bonding ritual between you and a succubus spirit. The spirit makes you capable of using abilities associated both chaos and lust. Choosing to use these abilities changes your outlook and enables and limits future choices in the game. Choose your affinities wisely for they will eventually lead you down a path of love or a darker path.

Hybrid-graphics Approach

Warlord focuses heavily on the intimate/dramatic moments of the game with high-quality animations. Scenic, stylized images and animated images are used in between where most of the story unfolds.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later
  • Processor: Pentium or Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD Zen or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Warlord

  • Processor: Pentium or Core CPU

  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
